about_the_game:
[This game is of the VR Hardcore genre. Kids, stay away!]

[The story begins with the absolute god 'Arteus' and the female warrior 'Iris']


In return for the chance to evolve, humanity pledged unwavering loyalty to the all-powerful deity, Arteus.

Arteus entrusted the governance of the human realm to Talos, but power became hereditary, eventually falling into the grasp of Hirakes, who harbored intentions of enslaving mankind.

Faced with the weight of oppressive rule, humans rose up, sparking a revolution. However, the enraged god rained down ten disasters upon them.

Amidst an era of devastation and turmoil, the legendary warrior Iris emerged, signaling the beginning of the protagonist's resistance against the despotic reign of the omnipotent god and the oppression imposed by Hirakes...




To overthrow the absolute god Arteus, you must ascend an endless tower.
Its height is uncertain, but it is known to be 100 floors high.






Chapter 1 begins with the first stage of the disaster brought about by the absolute god Arteus, featuring hellish landscapes and monsters. Particularly, the River of Blood, boiling with lava, and the cave walls are all dripping with blood, and the monsters that used to live off this blood refuse to allow humans to enter.

The tower in Chapter 1 is ten floors high, and you must defeat the boss monster protecting Arteus and his minions.
(Currently, only Chapter 1 (Bloody Hell) has been revealed in the game. Please look forward to the expansion of the story to resolve the disasters given by Arteus in the future, such as the starving demon, livestock, human world, heaven, etc. Subsequent development depends on your response and honest reviews.)

[This game maximizes the features of VR]


This is evident in the weapon system for progressing in the game. The weapons given to Iris for the battle against Arteus are of three types: melee weapons, firearms, and throwing weapons.
To acquire all the weapons, you need to win battles in many chapters. The given weapons are equipped on the protagonist Iris's body, and gamers have to pull out the weapon from their body at the right time to fight the enemies.
Some weapons may require various skills from the player, such as the intensity of swinging, reloading bullets, activating the explosion button, like in the real world.


[This game also includes puzzle elements]


You may be quite confused by the various puzzles you encounter in the game. Most puzzles can be solved through clues on each floor, but for some players who have no such game experience or lack reasoning skills, it can be a very difficult task.
We plan to gradually announce the game strategy for each floor through SNS. However, don't wait too long for the strategy reveal. We have to focus on development for the time being, so we don't know when we will start revealing the strategies (stay up all night to solve it yourself, or wait until the strategy is posted).

One hint is to listen to the words of Iris's ally 'Meri'. Meri was the first female warrior to oppose the absolute god before Iris was born, but now she is a mysterious figure whose whereabouts are unknown, only her words and records are passed down.


[This game requires very high PC performance]


We had a lot of concerns about performance and graphic quality. If we increased performance, graphic quality dropped, and if we increased graphic quality, performance dropped.
We boldly gave up performance. So, only users with good PCs can play. We could start working on improving performance now, but that could delay the release and maybe even make it more difficult to develop the game, so we prioritize the release.
We apologize to users who have difficulty playing due to performance issues.
(We need to survive to continue game development, don't we?)





[Chapter 1 missions are as follows]



"1F Memory Fragment"

1. Uncover hidden switches, defeat enemies, and secure three key pieces.
2. Fuse keys to activate the Blood Foundation and ascend to the second floor.






"2F Beginning of Awakening"

1. Discover the secret room.
2. Solve the puzzle concealed within the secret room.







"3F Search for the Rune Stone"

1.Obtain the handgun
2. Locate and safeguard the Rune Stone magic circle.






"4F On thin Icy"

1. Navigate through or disarm traps and navigate narrow passages.
2. Discover the Blood Altar.






"5F Red light"

1. Confront monsters emerging from the cave.
2. Dismantle the wall emitting a red glow







"6F Altar of the Wolf"

1. Resolve enigmatic cave puzzles to unseal Howling and Lone Wolf.
2. Overcome Baphomet using the unsealed powers.








"7F Owner of the Puddle"

1. Vanquish the puddle monsters.
2. Retrieve the machine gun item.






"8F Enigma Cave"

1. Defeat monsters, reach the path connected to the tail.
2. Withstand until the Blood Foundation arrives.






"9F Shrine of Hirakes"

1. Acquire the Battle Axe item.
2. Solve the puzzle, obtain the ancient ruins key.







"10F Blood Golem"

1. Explore the Forest of Mystery for the ancient ruins entrance.
2. Confront and defeat the Blood Golem.












Now the long war between Iris and Arteus has begun.

We hope you will overthrow the absolute god Arteus and his minions to save the oppressed humanity.



Enjoy! And thus you shall win!!


In the upcoming updates, we have exciting plans to introduce a plethora of weapons,
a wide array of diverse monster types, a sophisticated physics system, props, as well as intricate animations and stunning effects.

Get ready to be thrilled and anticipate the extraordinary!

---------------------------------------------------------------------


Once again,
I want to reiterate that your support will be a great source of strength for us.
Your encouragement will provide us with immense power and motivation.

content_descriptors.notes: The game is set in an apocalypse filled with monsters and other mutant creatures. Contains violence, gore, horror, and adult language and is not recommended for players under 18 years of age.

name: 100F BLESSING OF THE GUARDIAN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2070 / RX 5700 - 8GB VRAM
  • Storage: 20000 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
